title: Our 50th Anniversary - We are the University of Bradford

json.text: The University of Bradford's 50th anniversary is a time to learn from the great achievements of our past.
But it's also a time to look ahead, to innovate, to dream and to strive to excel.
We've come a long way 50 years.
In our 50th year we celebrate the talent of our people,  together we are the future.
We'll make a big impact in every corner of the globe.
Our research will change lives and will push the boundaries of knowledge.
Leaders will emerge from our campus, equipped to tackle the big global issues.
But no matter what the future holds for members of Team Bradford, we'll always
remember the change in ourselves. The ways we grew during our time at Bradford.
The things we learned, the friends we made, the people we became.
We're all part of the same story, we're all part of something special.
Bradford is a place where horizons are broadened, aspirations raised, and new passions are developed.
Our close-knit  community is welcoming and supportive, a home from home .
We're a truly diverse global village, a place where people from around the world meet to exchange ideas
and share their experience; of this we are proud.
Studying at Bradford is a unique life-changing experience.
We're learning everyday and we're loving every minute.
Here's to the pioneering spirit of the University of Bradford, here's to the next 50 years!
